I do appreciate you running a Hush explorer currently, and it will be useful to compare against a new explorer on the new chain

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <TheTrunk> We are providing light wallets for hush desktop & mobile and full node wallet as well as part of zelcore desktop. That comes with an explorer and I can offer electrum servers too. But as you doing a transition to asset chain requires a lot of work to redo those solutions - building and standing up new explorer, creating up to date binaries, new transaction format supports etc.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <TheTrunk> So I would like to support hush as this will basically be our first komodo asset chain (which is kinda exciting) and I am willing to put my free time to build the supporting solution for it. But considering that hush is introducing a fee it would be nice if hush can support zelcore and consider sharing server costs (25$ month)
